TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyPathConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Provides a type converter for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A is used to specify type and property paths to objects involved in a binding, or for storyboard target property paths. ## XAML Text Usage
